name: CISA Cybersecurity Hotline
purpose: Report cybersecurity incidents to federal authorities
whenToUse: Critical infrastructure incidents, significant cyber threats, need federal assistance

name: FBI Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3)
purpose: Report internet crimes and cyber fraud
whenToUse: Online fraud, cybercrime, BEC attacks, ransomware, hacking

name: FTC Identity Theft Hotline
purpose: Report identity theft and consumer fraud
whenToUse: Identity theft, consumer fraud, data breach impacts

name: US-CERT
purpose: Technical assistance and incident response coordination
whenToUse: Technical cybersecurity incidents, need coordination with CISA

name: Secret Service Electronic Crimes Task Force
whenToUse: Financial cybercrime, payment card fraud, network intrusions involving financial loss
